plot: The movie comprises four vignettes - the Gangsters, Be a Dirty Boy, It's Called a Receiver and Small Favour. Nine characters carry out conversations over the phone filled with love, loneliness, betrayal, lust and nostalgia.
title: Don't Hang Up, My Love
plot_es: The movie comprises four vignettes - the Gangsters, Be a Dirty Boy, It's Called a Receiver and Small Favour. Nine characters carry out conversations over the phone filled with love, loneliness, betrayal, lust and nostalgia.
plot_en: The movie comprises four vignettes - the Gangsters, Be a Dirty Boy, It's Called a Receiver and Small Favour. Nine characters carry out conversations over the phone filled with love, loneliness, betrayal, lust and nostalgia.
